content.text: Match ends, Barcelona 1, Manchester City 0.
Second Half ends, Barcelona 1, Manchester City 0.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Joe Hart.
Attempt saved. Neymar (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Gerard Piqué with a through ball.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Rafinha.
Substitution, Barcelona. Adriano replaces Dani Alves.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Vincent Kompany.
Attempt blocked. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from very close range is blocked. Assisted by Dani Alves.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Neymar.
Substitution, Manchester City. Frank Lampard replaces James Milner.
Offside, Barcelona. Lionel Messi tries a through ball, but Luis Suárez is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Rafinha.
Attempt saved. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Lionel Messi.
Substitution, Barcelona. Rafinha replaces Ivan Rakitic.
Attempt missed. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high from a direct free kick.
Martín Demichelis (Manchester City) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Martín Demichelis (Manchester City).
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt saved. Vincent Kompany (Manchester City) header from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by James Milner.
Dani Alves (Barcelona) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Dani Alves (Barcelona).
David Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by James Milner (Manchester City).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Dani Alves.
Penalty saved! Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Penalty conceded by Gerard Piqué (Barcelona) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Manchester City. Sergio Agüero draws a foul in the penalty area.
Attempt saved. Neymar (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Andrés Iniesta with a through ball.
Attempt blocked. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt missed. Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Sergio Agüero.
Neymar (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Fernandinho (Manchester City).
Substitution, Manchester City. Wilfried Bony replaces Yaya Touré.
Offside, Barcelona. Neymar tries a through ball, but Jordi Alba is caught offside.
Attempt saved. Neymar (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Lionel Messi.
Attempt missed. Yaya Touré (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Martín Demichelis.
Attempt blocked. James Milner (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jesús Navas.
Attempt blocked. Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Jesús Navas.
Attempt missed. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) left footed shot from the left side of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Lionel Messi.
Offside, Barcelona. Ivan Rakitic tries a through ball, but Luis Suárez is caught offside.
Corner,  Barcelona. Conceded by Martín Demichelis.
Attempt blocked. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Dani Alves.
Foul by Bacary Sagna (Manchester City).
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Attempt saved. Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Martín Demichelis.
Attempt blocked. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the left is blocked.
Foul by Fernandinho (Manchester City).
Lionel Messi (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Fernandinho (Manchester City) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Jesús Navas with a cross following a set piece situation.
Foul by Jordi Alba (Barcelona).
Bacary Sagna (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the right wing.
David Silva (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dani Alves (Barcelona).
Foul by Yaya Touré (Manchester City).
Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt saved. Lionel Messi (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic.
Attempt saved. Jordi Alba (Barcelona) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Lionel Messi with a through ball.
Attempt missed. Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left.
Attempt saved. Andrés Iniesta (Barcelona) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal.
Second Half begins Barcelona 1, Manchester City 0.
Substitution, Manchester City. Jesús Navas replaces Samir Nasri.
First Half ends, Barcelona 1, Manchester City 0.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Javier Mascherano.
Attempt blocked. Sergio Agüero (Manchester City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by James Milner.
Attempt missed. Yaya Touré (Manchester City) right footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Samir Nasri.
Luis Suárez (Barcelona) hits the right post with a right footed shot from the left side of the box. Assisted by Neymar with a through ball following a fast break.

Attempt missed. Luis Suárez (Barcelona) header from the centre of the box misses to the left. Assisted by Ivan Rakitic with a cross following a corner.

Foul by Yaya Touré (Manchester City).
Goal!  Barcelona 1, Manchester City 0. Ivan Rakitic (Barcelona) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the top right corner. Assisted by Lionel Messi.

Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Gerard Piqué.

Neymar (Barcelona) hits the left post with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Dani Alves with a through ball.
First Half begins.
Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
